biotools.summary: Set of specialist databases related to the study of polymorphic genes in the immune system. The project works with specialist groups or nomenclature committees who provide and curate individual sections before they are submitted for online publication. It consists of four databases: KIR, MHC, human platelet antigens and ESTDAB, which provides access to the European Searchable Tumour cell-line database, a cell bank of immunologically characterised melanoma cell lines.
